product.title: 3\" x 21\" Sanding Belts – 80 Grit Aluminum Oxide Abrasive with Durable Cloth Backing, Pack of 5 for Power Belt Sanders, Ideal for Woodworking, Metalworking, and DIY Projects
product.description: 80-grit aluminum oxide sanding belts for efficient material removal on wood, metal, and plastic. 3\"×21\" size fits most belt sanders. Durable cloth backing resists tearing. Ideal for shaping, rough sanding, and general prep.
